setup.title: Dejinta Martigeliyaha
setup.welcomeSubtitle: Aan kuu diyaarinno si aad u bilowdo martigelinta martida
setup.promptMessage: Deji siyaasadahaaga iyo doorbidyadaada si aad u bilowdo aqbalida boos celinta
setup.setupCompleteMessage: Dejintaada martigeliyaha waa la dhameystiray! Hadda waad aqbali kartaa boos celin.
setup.cancelMessage: Ma hubtaa inaad joojinayso? Waxaad dhameystiri kartaa mar dambe, laakiin ma aqbali doontid boos celin ilaa aad dhameystirto dejinta.
setup.listingsPromptMessage: Dhameystir dejinta martigeliyaha si aad u bilowdo ku darista iyo maaraynta hantidaada
setup.todayPromptMessage: Dhameystir dejinta martigeliyaha si aad u aragto dashboard-kaaga boos celinta iyo dakhliga
setup.calendarPromptMessage: Dhameystir dejinta martigeliyaha si aad u maamusho jadwalkaaga boos celinta
setup.profilePromptMessage: Dhameystir dejinta martigeliyaha si aad u gasho dejinta profile-kaaga martigeliyaha

verification.title: Account Verification
verification.subtitle: Complete verification to ensure guest safety and trust

email.title: Email Verification
email.subtitle: Verify your email address for secure communication
email.codeExpired: Code expired. Please request a new one.
email.helpText: We'll send a verification code to your email address. This helps ensure secure communication with guests.

phone.title: Phone Verification
phone.subtitle: Verify your phone number for urgent communications
phone.codeExpired: SMS code expired. Please request a new one.
phone.invalidCode: Invalid SMS code. Please try again.
phone.helpText: We'll send an SMS with a verification code. This enables urgent communication with guests if needed.

identity.title: Identity Verification
identity.subtitle: Verify your identity for guest safety and trust
identity.helpText: Identity verification helps build trust with guests and ensures platform safety. This process is secure and confidential.
identity.documentError: Failed to upload document. Please try again.
identity.privacyNote: Your identity documents are encrypted and stored securely. We only use them for verification purposes.

agreement.title: Host Agreement
agreement.subtitle: Review and accept the terms and policies required to host on our platform
agreement.allRequiredCompleted: All required agreements have been accepted. You can proceed to the next step.
agreement.requiredRemaining: Please accept the required terms and privacy policy to continue.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: The legal agreement governing your use of our platform as a host
terms.helpText: The Terms of Service outline your rights and responsibilities as a host on our platform.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information
privacy.helpText: Our Privacy Policy explains how we handle your personal data and protect your privacy.

guarantee.title: Host Guarantee
guarantee.subtitle: Optional protection program for property damage and liability
guarantee.helpText: The Host Guarantee provides additional protection for your property and liability coverage.
guarantee.optionalNote: This is optional but recommended for additional protection.

agreement.legalNoticeText: By accepting these agreements, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms. These agreements may be updated from time to time, and continued use of our platform constitutes acceptance of any changes.
agreement.cannotOpenDocument: Cannot open document. Please try again later.
agreement.documentError: Error opening document. Please check your internet connection.

policies.title: Default Policies
policies.subtitle: Set your default hosting policies. These will apply to all your properties unless you customize them individually.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.subtitle: Choose your default cancellation policy for all listings
cancellation.description: Your cancellation policy affects guest refunds and your earnings. Choose carefully as it impacts guest booking decisions.

flexible.title: Flexible
flexible.subtitle: Full refund if canceled at least 7 days before check-in
flexible.description: Guests get a full refund if they cancel at least 7 days before check-in. After that, guests pay for each night they stay, plus 1 additional night.
flexible.refundPolicy: Full refund 7+ days before â€¢ Partial refund 1-6 days before â€¢ No refund day of check-in

moderate.title: Moderate
moderate.subtitle: Full refund if canceled at least 5 days before check-in
moderate.description: Guests get a full refund if they cancel at least 5 days before check-in. After that, guests pay for each night they stay, plus 1 additional night.
moderate.refundPolicy: Full refund 5+ days before â€¢ Partial refund 1-4 days before â€¢ No refund day of check-in

strict.title: Strict
strict.subtitle: Full refund if canceled at least 14 days before check-in
strict.description: Guests get a full refund if they cancel at least 14 days before check-in. After that, guests pay for each night they stay, plus 1 additional night.
strict.refundPolicy: Full refund 14+ days before â€¢ Partial refund 7-13 days before â€¢ No refund 1-6 days before

cancellation.helpText: Your cancellation policy affects guest refunds and your earnings. You can customize this for individual properties later.

houseRules.title: House Rules
houseRules.subtitle: Set clear expectations for guests
houseRules.description: Set your default house rules. These will apply to all your listings unless you customize them individually.

checkInOut.title: Check-in & Check-out Times
checkInOut.helpText: Set standard check-in and check-out times for your properties.

smoking.title: Smoking Allowed
smoking.subtitle: Allow guests to smoke on your property
smoking.helpText: Clearly state your smoking policy to avoid misunderstandings.

pets.title: Pets Allowed
pets.subtitle: Allow guests to bring pets
pets.helpText: Specify if guests can bring pets and any restrictions.

parties.title: Parties & Events Allowed
parties.subtitle: Allow guests to host parties or events
parties.helpText: Set clear expectations about parties and events.

quietHours.title: Quiet Hours
quietHours.subtitle: Set quiet hours for your property
quietHours.helpText: Set quiet hours to ensure peaceful stays for all guests.

additionalRules.title: Additional Rules
additionalRules.helpText: Add any other rules specific to your properties.

checkInPreferences.title: Check-in Preferences
checkInPreferences.description: How would you like guests to check in to your property?

selfCheckIn.title: Self Check-in
selfCheckIn.subtitle: Guests can check in without meeting you
selfCheckIn.helpText: Guests can access your property using a key code or lockbox.

keyPickup.title: Key Pickup Required
keyPickup.subtitle: Guests must pick up keys from a specific location
keyPickup.helpText: Guests will pick up keys from a designated location or person.

meetAndGreet.title: Meet & Greet
meetAndGreet.subtitle: You prefer to meet guests in person
meetAndGreet.helpText: You'll meet guests in person to provide keys and orientation.

instructions.title: Check-in Instructions
instructions.helpText: Add specific instructions for guests about how to access your property.

preferences.title: Host Preferences
preferences.subtitle: Set your hosting preferences to provide the best experience for your guests.

responseTime.title: Response Time
responseTime.subtitle: How quickly do you typically respond to guest messages?

within1Hour.title: Within 1 hour
within1Hour.description: Respond to messages within 1 hour for the best guest experience

responseTime.helpText: Faster response times lead to better guest experiences and more bookings.

instantBooking.title: Instant Booking
instantBooking.subtitle: Allow guests to book instantly without waiting for approval
instantBooking.description: Guests can book your property immediately without waiting for approval
instantBooking.helpText: Instant booking can increase your bookings but requires you to keep your calendar updated.

bookingSettings.title: Booking Settings
bookingSettings.subtitle: Configure your booking requirements and availability

minimumNotice.title: Minimum Notice (hours)
minimumNotice.description: How much advance notice do you need for bookings?
minimumNotice.helpText: Set the minimum time you need to prepare for guests.

maxAdvanceBooking.title: Max Advance Booking (days)
maxAdvanceBooking.description: How far in advance can guests book?
maxAdvanceBooking.helpText: Set how far in advance guests can make reservations.

languages.title: Languages
languages.subtitle: Select the languages you can communicate in with guests
languages.helpText: Guests can filter by hosts who speak their language.

locationSettings.title: Location & Currency
locationSettings.subtitle: Set your timezone and preferred currency

currency.title: Preferred Currency
currency.description: Currency for displaying prices and payments
currency.helpText: Your currency preference will be used throughout the app.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.helpText: This helps with scheduling and communication timing.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Choose how you want to receive notifications
notifications.helpText: Choose how and when you want to be notified about important events.

profile.title: Host Profile
profile.subtitle: Create a welcoming profile that helps guests get to know you better.

photo.title: Profile Photo
photo.subtitle: Add a friendly photo to help guests recognize you
photo.selectPhotoDescription: Choose how you'd like to add your photo
photo.helpText: A clear, friendly photo helps guests feel more comfortable booking with you.

bio.title: About You
bio.subtitle: Tell guests about yourself and what makes you a great host
bio.placeholder: Share a bit about yourself, your interests, and what you love about hosting guests...
bio.minLength: Bio must be at least 50 characters
bio.helpText: A thoughtful bio helps guests get to know you and builds trust.

details.title: Personal Details
details.subtitle: Share some basic information about yourself

location.title: Location
location.helpText: Your location helps guests understand your local knowledge.

occupation.title: Occupation
occupation.helpText: Sharing your occupation helps guests relate to you.

interests.title: Interests
interests.subtitle: What are you passionate about? (Select up to 10)
interests.helpText: Sharing your interests helps guests connect with you on a personal level.

languages.title: Languages You Speak
languages.subtitle: Select languages you can communicate in
languages.helpText: Guests can filter by hosts who speak their language.

tips.title: Profile Tips
tips.description: A complete profile with a photo and thoughtful bio helps guests feel more comfortable booking with you. Hosts with complete profiles get 40% more bookings.

success.title: Welcome to Hosting!
success.subtitle: Congratulations! You've successfully completed your host setup and are ready to start welcoming guests.

features.listingsDesc: Add your properties and start accepting bookings
features.calendarDesc: Set availability and block dates as needed
features.messagingDesc: Chat with guests before and during their stay
features.insightsDesc: Track your earnings and booking performance

success.nextStepsDesc: Ready to start your hosting journey? You can add your first property or explore your new host dashboard.

help.verification: Verification helps build trust with guests and ensures platform safety.
help.agreement: These agreements protect both you and your guests.
help.policies: Clear policies help set guest expectations and protect your property.
help.preferences: Your preferences help us provide the best experience for you and your guests.
help.profile: A complete profile helps guests feel comfortable booking with you.
help.autoSave: Your progress is automatically saved. You can continue later if needed.
help.stepNavigation: You can navigate between completed steps to make changes.
help.validation: Please complete all required fields before proceeding to the next step.

cancellation.title: Siyaasadda Joojinta
cancellation.subtitle: Deji filashooyin cad oo martida ah
cancellation.description: Dooro siyaasadda joojinta ee ku habboon hantidaada. Had iyo jeer waad beddeli kartaa tan hanti kasta si gaar ah.

flexible.title: Dabacsan
flexible.subtitle: Martidu way joojin karaan ilaa 24 saacadood ka hor gelitaanka
flexible.details: Lacag buuxda ayaa la soo celinayaa haddii la joojiyo 24+ saacadood ka hor gelitaanka

moderate.title: Dhexdhexaad
moderate.subtitle: Martidu way joojin karaan ilaa 5 maalmood ka hor gelitaanka
moderate.details: Lacag buuxda ayaa la soo celinayaa haddii la joojiyo 5+ maalmood ka hor gelitaanka, 50% lacag la soo celinayo haddii la joojiyo 1-4 maalmood ka hor

strict.title: Adag
strict.subtitle: Martidu way joojin karaan ilaa 14 maalmood ka hor gelitaanka
strict.details: Lacag buuxda ayaa la soo celinayaa haddii la joojiyo 14+ maalmood ka hor gelitaanka, 50% lacag la soo celinayo haddii la joojiyo 7-13 maalmood ka hor

houseRules.title: Xeerarka Guriga
houseRules.subtitle: Deji filashooyin cad oo martida ah
houseRules.description: Deji xeerarka gurigaaga caadiga ah. Kuwani waxay khuseyn doonaan dhammaan liisaskaaga ilaa aad si gaar ah u beddesho.

smoking.title: Sigaar Cabid La Ogol Yahay
smoking.subtitle: U ogolow martida inay sigaar cabaan gurigaaga

pets.title: Xayawaan La Ogol Yahay
pets.subtitle: U ogolow martida inay xayawaan keensadaan

parties.title: Xaflado & Munaasabado La Ogol Yahay
parties.subtitle: U ogolow martida inay xaflado ama munaasabado qabtaan

checkInPreferences.title: Doorbidyada Gelitaanka
checkInPreferences.description: Sidee rabtaa in martidu u galaan gurigaaga?

selfCheckIn.title: Is-galitaan
selfCheckIn.subtitle: Martidu waxay iskeed u gali karaan adigoon la kulmin

keyPickup.title: Furaha Waa La Soo Qaadanayaa
keyPickup.subtitle: Martidu waa inay furaha ka soo qaataan meel gaar ah

meetAndGreet.title: La Kulmo & Soo Dhaweyn
meetAndGreet.subtitle: Waxaad doorbideysaa inaad la kulanto martida

defaultPolicies.title: Siyaasadaha Caadiga ah
defaultPolicies.subtitle: Deji siyaasadahaaga martigelinta caadiga ah. Kuwani waxay khuseyn doonaan dhammaan hantidaada ilaa aad si gaar ah u beddesho.

summary.title: Kooban Siyaasad
summary.description: Siyaasadahan waxaa si caadi ah loogu dabaqi doonaa dhammaan liisaskaaga. Had iyo jeer waad beddeli kartaa tan hanti kasta si gaar ah.

preferences.title: Doorbidyada Martigeliyaha
preferences.subtitle: Deji doorbidyadaada martigelinta si aad u siiso martidaada waayo-aragnimo fiican.

responseTime.title: Waqtiga Jawaabta
responseTime.subtitle: Intee si dhakhso ah ayaad uga jawaabtaa fariimaha martida?
responseTime.within1HourDesc: Ugu jawaab fariimaha saacad gudaheed si aad u hesho waayo-aragnimo marti fiican

instantBooking.title: Boos Celin Degdeg ah
instantBooking.subtitle: U ogolow martida inay si degdeg ah u boos celin karaan adigoon sugayn ogolaansho
instantBooking.description: Martidu waxay si toos ah u boos celin karaan hantidaada adigoon sugayn ogolaansho

bookingSettings.title: Dejinta Boos Celinta
bookingSettings.subtitle: Deji shuruudahaaga boos celinta iyo helitaanka

languages.title: Luuqadaha
languages.subtitle: Dooro luuqadaha aad kula xiriiri karto martida

locationSettings.title: Goobta & Lacagta
locationSettings.subtitle: Deji aaggaaga waqtiga iyo lacagta aad doorbideyso

notifications.title: Ogeysiisyada
notifications.subtitle: Dooro sida aad rabto in laguu ogeysiiyo

summary.title: Kooban Doorbidyo
summary.description: Doorbidyadan waxay naga caawinayaan inaan siino adiga iyo martidaada waayo-aragnimo fiican. Had iyo jeer waad beddeli kartaa dejintan.

profile.title: Profile-ka Martigeliyaha
profile.subtitle: Abuur profile soo dhaweyn leh oo ka caawiya martida inay si fiican kuu bartaan.

photo.title: Sawirka Profile-ka
photo.subtitle: Ku dar sawir saaxiibtinimo si martidu kuu aqoonsato
photo.selectPhotoDescription: Dooro sida aad rabto inaad sawirkaaga ku darto
photo.permissionRequired: Ogolaanshaha maktabadda sawirada waa loo baahan yahay
photo.cameraPermissionRequired: Ogolaanshaha kamarada waa loo baahan yahay
photo.uploadError: Waa lagu guuldareystay in la soo geliyo sawirka
photo.cameraError: Waa lagu guuldareystay in la qaado sawirka

bio.title: Kaa Waran
bio.subtitle: U sheeg martida wax badan naftaada iyo waxa kaa dhigaya marti fiican
bio.placeholder: La wadaag wax yar naftaada, danahaaga, iyo waxa aad jeceshahay martigelinta...
bio.tips: Noqo mid daacad ah oo soo dhaweyn leh

details.title: Faahfaahinta Shakhsiyeed
details.subtitle: La wadaag xog kooban oo naftaada ah

tips.title: Talooyin Profile
tips.description: Profile dhameystiran oo leh sawir iyo bio fikir leh waxay ka caawisaa martida inay si kalsooni leh kuu doortaan. Martida leh profile dhameystiran waxay helaan 40% boos celin dheeraad ah.

verification.subtitle: Help us keep our community safe and secure by verifying your account information.

phone.subtitle: We'll send a verification code to your phone number

identity.title: Identity Verification
identity.subtitle: Upload a government-issued ID to verify your identity

verification.whyVerifyText: Account verification helps us maintain a trusted community by ensuring all hosts are who they say they are. This builds confidence for both hosts and guests.
